changeSet.author: dimaskop18@gmail.com
changeSet.sql: INSERT INTO rh.roles (name) VALUES ('ADMIN')
INSERT INTO rh.roles (name) VALUES ('USER')

changeSet.id: rename id_columns of all tables just to id
changeSet.author: dimaskop18@gmail.com
changeSet.sql: ALTER TABLE rh.employees RENAME COLUMN employee_id TO id
ALTER TABLE rh.positions RENAME COLUMN position_id TO id
ALTER TABLE rh.positions_log RENAME COLUMN position_log_id TO id
ALTER TABLE rh.positions_subdivisions_link RENAME COLUMN psl_id TO id
ALTER TABLE rh.ranks RENAME COLUMN rank_id TO id
ALTER TABLE rh.ranks_log RENAME COLUMN rank_log_id TO id
ALTER TABLE rh.subdivisions RENAME COLUMN subdivision_id TO id
ALTER TABLE rh.users RENAME COLUMN user_id TO id
ALTER TABLE rh.roles RENAME COLUMN role_id TO id
ALTER TABLE rh.users_roles_link RENAME COLUMN url_id TO id
